column4: Whats the correct channel for an issue with NVidia Binary Driver and 10.10, i have a GTS250, which is apparently not supported
you card HAS to be supported
if i were i would try maybe the 10.04 version with a live cd and see if working
Not that old..... Ubuntu 10.04 worked great but was a pain in the *** to install due to fake raid, this has only happened since upgrading to 10.10
